attributes.action: make disruptive industrial action illegal, forcing resolution by an appointed mediator.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Disruptive industrial action adversely affects not only the two parties in dispute but numerous third parties by consequence too. Third parties are therefore subject to damages beyond their control and compensation should be forthcoming. Settlement is ultimately by compromise and often involves a mediator by agreement. This proposal goes one step further in an attempt to protect all thisd parties.
